channel.title: Dark_Miner (Auto Updater)
channel.description:
Dark_Miner
Features:
updating: updates script with a press of a button. (in the script)
Antiban + extra antiban not included into srl.
AntiRandoms (all that srl covers)
its multiplayer
has autocolor or if you wish you can manually put in a color for each multiplayer.
Extremly fast error reporting! just click report error and report it! ill fix it fast depending on the severity and how many i got to fix...
This is a great mining script.
It looks like and runs like a pay script but its free here boys 'n girls.
please update script right away.
Instructions:
how to use:
1. Drag cross - hairs over runescape client (2 times)
2. Logout
3. Fill out the appropriate lines.
4. press play.
5. fill out form (or choose from form options).
6. click run and let the script do its job.
_____________
How to update:
1. press play.
2. Click Update Script.
3. Read everything in report box (even the why i updated just in case).
4. close the script without saving and then reopen it.
________________
How To report an error:
1. Press Play.
2. click Report Error.
3. Sign up on my forums.
4. post about the error (where it happened give me details)
______________
Please post here or my forums
any reports or request for script.
thanks goes out to SRL team for the include.
[code] {.Script Info: # ScriptName = Dark_miner # Author = Dark_sniper # Description = Power mines # Version = Beta # Date = 2/17/07 # Comments = # Fill Lines = 20 - 34 and 60 /Script Info}[/code]
THE SEVER IM USING IS TEMP! THANK THEREALJDB FOR HOSTING ALL THE FILES NEEDED TO UPDATE!
you guys will know i switch servers back to my own when you need to accept my script connecting to my server.
therealjdb is trustworthy enough to have the files on his server so do not say he going to h4x0r you its impossible (or near impossible) to steal your password.
Download Here: http://www.gotbuddy.com/Dark_Miner.rar
(i made it a .rar file so you could download it and didnt have to copy and paste.
I WANNA AUTO UPDATE LIKE DARK_SNIPER:
WELL NOW YOU CAN : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,85740.0.html

It says this ->

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL.SCAR does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\Skill\Mining.SCAR does not exist.

Boo…I’m a noob and this doesn’t make sense and i’ve read the tutorials and forums on RAR And SRL and they aren’t helping. Am i over-thinking this?
